Html:
When my query has a Portuguese character appears a message error that says that those characters are not supported.

I am using the following code to convert query:

 

AstNode root = _compiler.Parse(avs_query.ToLower());

if (!CheckParseErrors()) return "";

return SearchGrammar.ConvertQuery(root, SearchGrammar.TermType.Inflectional);

 

What I need to change to support Portuguese characters?

Thanks & Regards,

Rui

Looks like you're using Search grammar and Irony version from zip in M.Coles' article. It is very outdated

Current download on this site contains newer version of SearchGrammar that supports non-English alphabets
